content: Hyoseung Kim Hyoseung Kim Associate Professor, Electrical and Computer Engineering Chair, Computer Engineering Program Cooperating Faculty, Computer Science and Engineering University of California, Riverside Office: 346 Winston Chung Hall900 University AvenueRiverside, CA 92521 Email: hyoseung@ucr.edu Phone: (951) 827-2390 Google Scholar | LinkedIn Profile About Me I am an Associate Professor in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of California, Riverside. I received my Ph.D. in Electrical and Computer Engineering from Carnegie Mellon University in 2016. Research in our lab centers around real-time, embedded and cyber-physical systems. Specifically, we aim to achieve safe, predictable, and efficient computing under uncertain environments, which is a critical area of research for the continued innovation and widespread usability of intelligent autonomous technologies including self-driving cars and smart health and agriculture. We seek opportunities at the intersection of real-time cyber-physical systems and modern parallel computing platforms, and develop novel system software, algorithms, modeling and analysis techniques as a key enabler to build reliable, efficient and usable systems in practice.
